description: ContextAnalyzer fails to analyze market context from indicators. QuantraScore accuracy degraded without context.
commonCauses: Invalid indicator ranges breaking analysis logic
solutions: Implement fallback to basic context without indicators
Provide default context for missing indicators
Use partial context when some indicators missing
Cache last valid context as fallback
Implement timeout handling with default context
Log context analysis failures for debugging
prevention: Validate context rules configuration at startup
Provide sensible defaults for all context components
